title: Data Fetching Overview
subject: Next.js
theory: Next.js 14+ uses the standard `fetch` API extended with caching and revalidation logic. Data fetching happens on the server by default (in Server Components).
syntax: async function getData() { const res = await fetch(...) }

examples.explanation: No useEffect needed. Async components just await data.

common_mistakes.mistake: Using useEffect for initial data load
common_mistakes.correction: Use Server Components for better performance.

interview_questions.question: How is fetch different in Next.js?
interview_questions.answer: It is patched to include caching/revalidation arguments.
